Name: Grand Library Route Map
AttributesDescription: There is a mark on the top left of the map. This could be where the puzzle is.
BgDescription: A small scroll inside the Sundial, mapping the possible routes of the "Grand Library", the central database in City Hall. There is a red circle on the top left corner of the map that possibily indicates the location of a secret contraption, indicating a confusing detour to the destination.
ObtainedShowDescription: There is a mark on the top left of the map. This could be where the puzzle is.
